Bash(gh release create v1.0.0 --title "v1.0.0" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Initial Release

CLI tool to scaffold Micro Frontend \(MFE\) shells and modules.

### Features
- Create MFE shells \(Module Federation host\)
- Create MFE modules \(Module Federation remote\)
- Registry-based module discovery
- Vite + React + Tailwind CSS
- React Router support
- TypeScript

### Usage

```bash
# Create a shell
npx @pablo-clueless/create-mfe-module --shell myapp --registry-repo ./registry

# Create a module
npx @pablo-clueless/create-mfe-module --module finance --shell-target myapp --registry-repo ./registry --port 3001
```
EOF
\)")
